Tucson touches down gracefully on all fours and lowers his back to the grou=
nd to allow for safe dismount of everyone, including Nightshift who was sti=
ll unconscious .   His wings are extended to act like a dismount ramp, maki=
ng it easier to get to the ground.

Yet even though there was no signs of t=
he humans he could still sense that they could be somewhere hidden.  His ex=
pression is neutral yet stern.

" Rodimus, this planet is still in danger. =
 The creatures who live here and the environment is under an attack that th=
e unknown enemy is forging.  They must be found, and I too will search for =
them.  When they are found, they will be brought in front of Talon and myse=
lf.  She is my mate, and thus the second Guardian of this planet.  What she=
 deems mandatory, must be performed without question.  And speaking of Talo=
n..."

His face lightens up immensely.  He now bows to Rodimus and strides =
off to find Talon.

" Talon, it's me, I'm home and I have missed you terrib=
ly."

He transforms and walks around the Ark, hoping to find her.
